title: Říkání o víle Amálce
overview: A cartoon about the forest fairy Amalka. In the first tale, Amalka merrily walked between the fir trees and blew on the flowers so that the pollen was transferred from flower to flower. But the wind picked her up and lifted her high above the ground. … In the second tale, Amalka walks through the glades and helps herbs and flowers to scatter the seeds wider. And the harmful nettle does not let Amalka go further and "stings" her. The little fairy began to cry, and her tears turned into an amazing stream ...
